FuncDef: This command assigns a Traffic Engineering (TE) Link to a given LMP peer. The TE Link with IDte-link-idmust already have been created underconfig>router>lmp>te-link.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the TE Link. Values-1 to 4294967295 | te-link-name
te-link-name: 32 character (max) name of the TE Link.
